alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 11:11AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Central and western Guam. * WHEN...Until 100 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1109 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches will be possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tamuning, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Hagatna Heights, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Asan and Piti. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
